translations: 吱吱叫；嘁嘁喳喳地讲；尖声说话；在推特网发博；傻笑
鸟叫声；兴奋，紧张；闲话；傻笑

sentences.sentence: His medical centre also has a Facebook page, a MySpace page and a Twitter feed.
sentences.translation: 他的医疗中心也有一个 Facebook 页面，一个  MySpace 页面和一个 Twitter 订阅源。

sentences.sentence: One Twitter group is offering its followers single-sentence-long "digests" of the great novels.
sentences.translation: 一个 Twitter 团体正在向其追随者提供伟大小说的单句“摘要”。

sentences.sentence: At this year's CHIRP Conference, Twitter revealed that it's attempting to address some of these very issues.
sentences.translation: 在今年的 CHIRP 会议上，Twitter 透露它将尝试解决这些问题。
